appetizers.name: DEV soup
appetizers.description: Warm and cozy on cold days around Bryan University

appetizers.name: FSW Sweet and Sour
appetizers.description: It's always hot ! But sometimes its sweet, sometimes she can be real sour !
ingredients: Eggplant, egg flour, cheap package of spices from safeway.

coldSandwitch.name: Cold old Cerego
coldSandwitch.description: She's old, She's cold and leaves no mercy !

coldSandwitch.name: The Sandy Wrath
coldSandwitch.description: A slightly warmed sourdough biscuit with a happy holiday flavor.
ingredients: bread, turkey, cranberries, pesto, cream cheese, veggie.

hotSandwitch.name: Comatose
hotSandwitch.description: She's a fattie ! Everything in the fridge gets heated up and served on a hoagie roll !
ingredients: Salami, Ham, Turkey, Salad leftover from the night before, Mustard, Mayo, Pickles, Olives, Bacon, Pesto, Special sauce !

hotSandwitch.name: The Runner
hotSandwitch.description: Run on in ! We have the runner for those on the go ! A SIMPLE WARM SUB for those that have a lot to do !
ingredients: Your choice of bread, your choice of cheese, your choice of 1 meat, all grilled lightley to a melted profection

deserts.name: The monster
deserts.description: Six Prunes frozen on a stick

drinks.name: The muffin man
drinks.description: do you know him ? he's wild !
ingredients: Vodka,Rum, Sprits, Lemon juice, Aged fruit

drinks.name: The Ion Defibrillator
drinks.description: She makes you go night - night...bye !
ingredients: Vodka, Rum, Soda, Tequila, Whisky, Gin, Lots of fruit juice
